title: I am passing 10+2 from the art stream. How can I become an ethical hacker? - Quora

response.answer_text: To be an Ethical Hacker first you need to have basic computer and networking knowledge. I will recommend you to first learn basic computer and networking. Then you can easily understand & learn Ethical Hacking. You can visit our website www.pentesting.in to learn various computer courses online including Networking and Ethical Hacking. You can also watch our YouTube videos and learn Ethical Hacking.
